headline: Which S&P500 stocks are showing activity after the closing bell on Tuesday?
summary: After the conclusion of the US market's regular session on Tuesday, let's examine the after-hours session and unveil the notable S&P500 performers among the top gainers and losers.

headline: Pricing vs. Volume: Can Colgate Balance Growth in a Soft Market?
summary: CL faces muted demand and cautious consumers as it balances pricing discipline with volume recovery to protect growth in a soft global market.

raw.headline: Pricing vs. Volume: Can Colgate Balance Growth in a Soft Market?
raw.summary: CL faces muted demand and cautious consumers as it balances pricing discipline with volume recovery to protect growth in a soft global market.

headline: HRL's Pricing and Cost Actions to Support Margins in FY26
summary: Hormel Foods sees improving earnings visibility into fiscal 2026 as pricing actions, cost cuts and efficiency gains begin to offset recent headwinds.

raw.headline: HRL's Pricing and Cost Actions to Support Margins in FY26
raw.summary: Hormel Foods sees improving earnings visibility into fiscal 2026 as pricing actions, cost cuts and efficiency gains begin to offset recent headwinds.

headline: MrBeast Weighs In After Reese's Heir Accuses Hershey's Of Changing Reese's Cup Ingredients: 'We Use Real Peanut Butter'
summary: MrBeast joined a public dispute after the grandson of H. B. Reese accused The Hershey Company of altering ingredients in Reese's Peanut Butter Cups, with the YouTuber promoting his competing brand Feastables and defending its use of "real peanut butter" and ethical sourcing.

raw.headline: MrBeast Weighs In After Reese's Heir Accuses Hershey's Of Changing Reese's Cup Ingredients: 'We Use Real Peanut Butter'
raw.summary: MrBeast joined a public dispute after the grandson of H. B. Reese accused The Hershey Company of altering ingredients in Reese's Peanut Butter Cups, with the YouTuber promoting his competing brand Feastables and defending its use of "real peanut butter" and ethical sourcing.
